file_content.text: You catch the latest feed? Republic took the Kalsunor system, oh-five-hundred this morning.
Blast. I had some friends stationed there.
Probably getting interrogated by some lizard-faced officer now. Assuming they're still alive.
This fuel source we're after, the isotope-5... sergeant said it could change the course of the war.
Something better. Before we end up singing "All Stars Burn as One."
